Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'No guards at the entrance, nor any other restrictions.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Lucia leads the way cautiously at a quick pace, while Lee is observing the surroundings closely. Liv follows, her curiosity piqued by the place.'}
{2: 'Peddling Voices', 3: 'Canned pupa! Three grubs a can!'}
{2: 'Peddling Voices', 3: 'Virus-free oxygen tanks! Long shelf life! Buy one get one free! Buy two get two free!'}
{2: 'Peddling Voices', 3: '—Ayyyy Razor Honey anyone?! Practically priceless, now at a fair price!!!'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '...No related information found. But an overall analysis of the conversations taking place here suggests that this is a market.', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'A market? In this time and age?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Only in the sense that they both engage in organized trade, but other than that...', 4: '3'}
{3: 'In a dark alley around a corner, Liv stops in her tracks before a shabby stall.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "You don't look well. Do you need help?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The voice is coarse and fuzzy, as if coming from damaged vocal cords.'}
{3: 'The stall keeper searches his cloak with a shaky hand, then presents Liv with a hermetic bag.'}
{3: 'He curls up his lips, trying to squeeze out a friendly smile.'}
{3: 'Greyish murky organs are floating within the bag, as if thrown in there on a whim.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'You need immediate treatment! Let me run a check on...'}
{2: 'Stall Keeper', 3: "Then I can go home... Can you pay in miles? I'll even give you a discount. H-how's that...?"}
{2: 'Stall Keeper', 3: 'I just have to get through tonight... Then once I earn enough grubs...'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Your heart rate is off the charts. Stay calm. I'll treat you immediately!"}
{3: 'The stall keeper grabs Liv by the arm and tries to pull her close, only to send himself lurching forward.'}
{2: 'Stall Keeper', 3: "Those horns... R-right, outsider Constructs have receptor horns... You're a Construct!"}
{2: 'Stall Keeper', 3: "A Construct that isn't the Kowloong Crew!"}
{2: 'Stall Keeper', 3: "I found you! You're mine! Pulao crew! Pulao crew! I have—"}
{3: 'You step in front of Liv to put some distance between her and the stall keeper.'}
{2: 'Onward, Gray Raven!', 3: '994', 4: "Let's deal with the enemies first.", 5: '994'}
